column5: "I'm available if any one wants a fishing partner"  November 22-25 in particular!  Hello all. I have taken a few days off next week and am wondering if anyone needs an additional person for fishing... anything. In the off chance anyone needs another body to fill out a group perhaps I could be the guy! May help reduce the cost. I am in the Toronto area. Tight lines all!  Mark
Hey wantabigone,why don't you full edit your request and say I'm available if any one wants a fishing partner. You may get a quick response.
